Articles.Content:
Hey guys,

I really want a mod which adds or changes planets but they almost all need the Planet Factory mod, are there some mods which don't need the Planet Factory mod?

Also I saw the real solar system mod which looks very good but does it use a lot of memory ram?

Thanks

Hey guys,

I really want a mod which adds or changes planets but they almost all need the Planet Factory mod, are there some mods which don't need the Planet Factory mod?

Also I saw the real solar system mod which looks very good but does it use a lot of memory ram?

Thanks

As far as I am aware, every single mod that adds planets to the game as of now, requires Planet Factory. There is a mod under development right now, called Kopernicus, which is designed to replace Planet Factory, however it is still under heavy development. As for the Real Solar system mod, I am not sure, as I don't use it myself, but I don't think it takes up much more memory than Planet Factory.
Nope, Kopernicus works enough you can play with it and make some planets, and with RSS to edit the PQSMods you can then make the planet into what you want.
Oh! Well, that's news to me..... Last I checked it was still in the "Download if you Dare" phase. Anyways, what I meant was that none of the planet mods support it yet. As far as I'm aware anyways!
